abstract: BigDeal, a new venture-backed “entertainment auction” site, takes on Swoopo.com by saying there is no way to lose.
snippet: BigDeal, a new venture-backed “entertainment auction” site, takes on Swoopo.com by saying there is no way to lose.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:36 p.m.  Corrected spelling of Nicolas Darveau-Garneau’s name in one instance.

headline.main: BigDeal Puts a New Spin on ‘Entertainment Shopping’
